page.title: 07Facilities of Bulford Camp
page.content: Bulford Camp today is like a small town.Accommodation is provided for all ranks.There is a Roman Catholic Church and a Church of England and two Primary Schools, with playgroups for the pre-school children. The modern shopping precinct has a bank, Post Office and Naafi, butchers, green grocers and newsagent as well as a launderette, hairdressers and video shop. A swimming pool, tennis court, Bingo Hall, Public House and several clubs cater for family recreation. There are mother and baby groups and a Thrift Shop for the wives. The Wive's Club organises meetings with visiting speakers. Outside the shopping precinct there is a small clothes shop, an electrical shop and a garage and filling station.
